short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check users in your Steam family group and indicate in your wishlist the games that are already being shared by those users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While preparing for the sales, I noticed that my Steam wishlist still showed games that were already in the family group. So, I decided to create this extension to allow users to easily identify the games already in the family library, helping them make informed decisions about their next purchases and to prioritize other purchases. You won't have to manually check each game in your family's library.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

List of Features:
路 Automatic display of games in the family library: Easily identify which games are already available to avoid duplicate purchases.
路 Identifies games in the store:  Easily identify which games are already available in the family, by who and how many of them.
路 Visual indicator: Shows a bookmark icon next to the games already shared in the wishlist.
路 Internationalization: Available in multiple languages, including Spanish, English, Portuguese, and Chinese.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Where does the extension work?
Steamventory works in any user's wishlist sections and the steam store.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Steamventory is a free, ad-free, and open-source extension.
Discover all the code behind Steamventory in the public GitHub repository.

https://github.com/Wito982/Steamventory

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you wish to support the project and help continue improving Steamventory, you can contribute through Ko-fi. It will be greatly appreciated!
